name: prodeq1d
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c1)))
bodyPretty: ⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c1))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c1)), wceq(c0, c2))
stmt.pretty: syl(w0, prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c1), c0 = c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c1))
⊣ (w0 → c0 = c2)
⊣ (c0 = c2 → prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c1))
⊣ (w0 → c0 = c2)
⊣ (c0 = c2 → prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c1)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

comment: Equality deduction for product. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 4-Dec-2017.)
